entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain mixed with snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
